nodes.description: Al Shabaab于1月15日攻占肯尼亚边境Ceel Cadde基地，宣称杀害超100名士兵并俘虏非盟维和人员
nodes.support_text: Al Shabaab, which is aligned with al Qaeda, said its fighters killed more than 100 Kenyan soldiers when they overrun the base in Ceel Cadde, near the Kenyan border, on Jan.15.

nodes.description: 肯尼亚军方证实使用与1998年美国使馆炸弹同等威力卡车炸弹发动自杀式袭击
nodes.support_text: Al Shabaab struck the base with a truck bomb which was as powerful as the one used by al Qaeda in 1998 to destroy the U.S. Embassy in Nairobi

nodes.description: Al Shabaab发布处决肯尼亚士兵的子弹头颅照片，否认自身伤亡
nodes.support_text: Al Shabaab on Wednesday published gruesome photos which purport to show the bullet-riddled bodies of dozens of Kenyan soldiers

nodes.description: 肯尼亚空军周末空袭摧毁两个Al Shabaab训练营
nodes.support_text: The strikes over the weekend targetted two Al Shabaab camps where the militants were hiding

nodes.description: KDF指挥官Mwathethe宣布击毙袭击策划者Mwalimu Janow
nodes.support_text: It is believed Mwalimu Janow... was killed

nodes.description: 灵柩照片曝光引发舆论压力，迫使肯尼亚政府承诺继续维和行动
nodes.support_text: newspaper pictures of coffins draped with Kenyan flags bringing back dead soldiers has increased pressure on President Uhuru Kenyatta

nodes.description: 肯尼亚总统Uhuru Kenyatta拒绝撤军，重申维和承诺
nodes.support_text: Kenyatta said Kenya was committed to bringing stability to Somalia

nodes.description: 肯尼亚国防军总司令（KDF chief）发表声明
nodes.support_text: 肯尼亚国防军总司令声明

nodes.description: 军方尚未公布死亡人数
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：军方尚未公布死亡人数；主体：Army officials；对象：the death toll
